participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, Emma is passionate about her dreams and enjoys outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: i was raised on a horse farm. my family has raised horses for a generations. i want to be a lawyer. i'm from a small town.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Friendly and nurturing, James loves teaching and spending time in nature with his pets.
participant_2.background: i attend church every week. i have a dogs. i work as a school teacher. i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors.
